ComicInfo.Summary: Akiko on Planet Earth : Part Two While Akiko was on Smoo the first time she was replaced by a robot that looked exactly like her... this is the story of what happened to that robot. Low on power Robot Akiko expends a lot of power dealing with Jimmy the bully. But leaves Akiko's life in much the same state as it was before she took over. On return to Smoo She has to go back into storage.. but Mr. Beeba takes pity as he starts to think of her as his own child.
